title: Actor Ananya Panday starts ‘Swachh Social Media’ campaign
text:
To spark a change on the birthday of the Father of the Nation, actor Ananya Panday took to social media to start her ‘Swachh Social Media’. The actor launched it by posting a video on her social media handles on Gandhi Jayanti.





She urged her followers and other viewers to take a pledge for ‘clean’ social media usage, just like she did. This campaign propels ahead her earlier initiative called ‘So Positive’ with the aim to curb the serious problem of social media and cyber bullying and thereby spreading positivity.





She captioned it “We all need to be the change that we want to see around us. Today, I have pledged that I won’t use abusive language on social media with the intent to hurt someone. If you also feel that we need our social environment to be cleaner and more positive, please take this step for a #SwachhSocialMedia #SoPositive @sopositivedsr”

Interestingly, Panday paired the name with the ‘Swachh Bharat Abhiyan’ launched by PM Narendra Modi five years ago on the same day. Her video was on the trending list on Twitter on Wednesday, and she received a huge response and praises for it.
description: The actor shared a video on Instagram taking the ‘Swachch Social Media’ pledge, urging her followers to do so as well
